I've come across a JUNIT extension called 'DBUnit' which can help us
unit t=
est database related activities. You can check that out for this
purpose i =
guess. 

It has features to load the test data in the form of Excel sheet a=
nd
also contains features to compare the results against actual DB data. 

=
http://dbunit.sourceforge.net/

Regards,
Sarat.
